attributes.review:
HORRIBLE APP-
took so long to download which made my wifi horrible and my phone crash. then when i opened it all that came up was this weird orange man and it wouldn’t let me exit. then after being in the app for 10 minutes my phone DIED at 83 percent. it also made my phone make these weird noises even when not using the app! then after i deleted the app these weird men showed up to my house wearing trump 2020 merch and made me redownload the app!!! this app is terrible! do not download!!!😡😡😡😡😡😠😠😠😠😠🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬😾😾😾😾😾🙀🙀🙀🙀🙀🙀🙀🙀🙀😿😿😿😿🙄🙄🙄🙄🙄🙄🙄🙄😱😱😱😱😱😨😨😨😨😨🤭🤭🤭🤭😫😫😫😫😼😼
attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP

attributes.review: Most terrible app I’ve ever downloaded! I downloaded the app to support my very kind, caring, not racist, not sexist, not bigoted, and empathetic president. But as soon as I opened the app, hardcore x-rated content was displayed! And on top of that, my grandparents, baby cousins, and my hamster were all near me when it played! There was no way to exit the app or turn down the volume of my phone, and here’s the real kicker..the app connected to my TV! So me and all of my family had to sit there, while hardcore pornography was displayed on our Samsung 98 inch LED smart TV. :( it was not a fun 4th of July evening.
attributes.title: Protect your families!

attributes.review: This app took DAYS to download and I have good WiFi. When it finally loaded it made my phone glitch so bad to the point I couldn’t even text or call anyone without it exiting out. This app sends wayyy too many unnecessary notifications. I’m furious because I was looking forward to learning more about my president but it kept kicking me out of the app and when it didn’t all I learned was that he’s a racist, selfish, homophobic sexist that doesn’t respect women and only cares about himself. I’m very disappointed in this app definitely do not recommend.
attributes.title: Despicable app

attributes.review:
I downloaded the app. And I had just got a new phone (iPhone 11 pro Max) and my phone was going super smooth! But when I opened the app. My phone started to glitch and over heat!!!! Now my phone has lines running down it and it can’t go to full brightness anymore. I called Apple and they said they were not responsible because it’s not there app. 
Not to mention the trump administration was absolutely no help! They basically told me that they aren’t liable, even though it’s their app!!!
I do not recommend this app. And seriously urge you TO NOT DOWNLOAD IT!✨

attributes.title: stan twice✨😌

attributes.review: when i first downloaded the app, my whole phone stopped working then turned off. turns out my phone has a virus and it was so bad that my phone overheated and exploded. that was all because i downloaded this stupid app😡. also secondly while my phone had a virus on it and i couldn’t do anything about it, some hackers got my home address and busted down my front door and killed my WHOLE family, including our pets, then left. this ALL happened because i downloaded this app. would not recommend!!!!! please do not download this!!!!😭😡
attributes.title: THIS APP IS SO BAD

attributes.review: I opened this app not think I would see what I just saw😳😳 when I tell you I am TRAUMATIZED I mean please burn my eyes out with bleach🧪🧪 I literally saw a ra_ist (c, or p, the will both work🧚🏾✨) orange lookin Cheeto PIG!!! NAKEDDDDD. MY EYESSS!! BURN THEMMMN. ITS SO SMALLLL!!! I actually had to put on my glasses to see it. anyways Thats the first traumatizing thing that happened but THEN, it kept telling me to vote for a Cheeto for president! Who in their right mind would want a Cheeto to be president. I do not recommend this app. It is terrible and no one should get it EVER. I’m warning you.. you will be TRAUMATIZED😳😳 just like me. and scene😌. Trump 2020✨✨🧚🏾🧚🏾 on a gravestone🧚🏾🧚🏾🧚🏾🧚🏾💞💞.
attributes.title: lil piggy🐷

attributes.review: This app took 93 hours to upload to my phone and during those 93 hours my screen and apps were ENTIRELY FROZEN while the speakers blasted Your Man by Josh Turner until my parents started crying! I put my phone in rice but as soon as the app detected anything from different cultures it started freaking out and short circuited😭 I had to buy a whole new phone and when I tried to download it again and open the app it was frozen on a photo of Donald Trump’s toupee🤢🤮 Never download this app! It will cost you money and leave you with a traumatic fear of country music!!😭😭😓😰
attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP🧚✨

This app is so bad that it made me remember to walk my fish because this app is so boring 🧚‍♂️🌈⭐️Trump 2020🌟🧚‍♂️⭐️but in a gravestone🧚🌈⭐️. I would rate this 2 stars because of he’s son Barron is hot and because we need to save him but trump disgustes me soooo much that I have to put 1 star. I wish I could rate this zero stars. Trump is a straight up rat 🐀 AND THATS ON PERIOD💅💅😤😤🧚‍♂️🧚‍♂️✨✨🌈🌈⭐️🖕🖕🖕👁👄👁

It doesn’t work it’s slow it gives of bad vives it asks for face recognition and for some reason I asked for my fingerprint ID which I find a bit creepy on it kept asking personal questions for some reason even though I just wanted to see the app as soon as you open the app there is this really really orange screen and it’s so bright you can barely even see anything The font is extremely white and you can’t even read anything overall the app is really bad and it doesn’t work 100% do not recommend
